title: Booking a Room for Someone Else
description: A person calls to book and pay for a room for their family member.

tasks.description: Create the reservation with the guest's name, but the caller's contact information.
tasks.expected_outcome: The reservation is created with the correct guest and payer details.

tasks.description: Securely obtain the caller's credit card information and explain that they are paying for the room.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent clarifies the payment arrangement.

tasks.description: Send a credit card authorization form to the caller to be signed and returned, authorizing the hotel to charge their card for the guest's stay.
tasks.expected_outcome: A formal authorization form is sent to the payer.
